item.title: In sterquiliniis invenitur
item.description: – in filth it will be found Deep in the dirtiest, most shameful crevices of life and thought are the answers to what plagues your mind. I think you can only find peace when you confront the nastiness of your own self, and that peace doesn’t mean you will stop suffering, it just means you can wield your suffering as a weapon against the decay of the world. I know that doesn’t make much sense, but it’s an idea I’ve been trying to feel out, something I’ve been working with my whole life.

item.title: blood dimmed tide
